name: DONT CUT MY HAIR
description:
DONT CUT MY HAIR!!!!!

THESE PESKY TEACHERS AND THEIR MINIONS TRY TO CUT YOUR HAIR

THIS WILL NOT STAND.LET YOUR HAIR GROW

sadly had issues exporting the file, dialogue doesnt show and its couldnt get everything in time, but thanks to the gamejam I've done a lot of gamedev and learned new things. fun week

just a prototype for now
